alert.note: Alert for Floyd; Mitchell (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 3:11AM CST until December 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Snow, Difficult Travel This Morning... .Heavy Snow will continue falling this morning with 1" to 2" per hour snowfall rates common along and north of the Interstate 94 corridor. Light snowfall expected to linger into the afternoon hours for parts of southeast Minnesota and northeast Iowa. Be prepared for hazardous travel conditions this morning, especially if traveling across western Wisconsin. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations near two inches expected. * WHERE...Mitchell and Floyd Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
